tool_description: 🔌Unlock YouTube's secrets with our API, extracting vital contact details - emails, social media, locations and more!
name: The Better YouTube Channel Details
title: The Better YouTube Channel Details

api_list.name: Channel details
api_list.description:
Download such information from the youtube channel as:
-  **social media** profiles: facebook, **twitter**, instagram, **onlyfans**, discord, vine, **medium** and much more!
- channel name, location, internal youtube id
- **emails** from description
- avatar
- rss url
- subscriber count
- overall channel view count
- more!

api_list.name: Health check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-better-youtube-channel-details.p.rapidapi.com/health-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-better-youtube-channel-details.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-better-youtube-channel-details.p.rapidapi.com/health-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-better-youtube-channel-details.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
